Chaos: Ch5
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: Chaos: Ch5
By Waddafxup 101 on Tuesday, July 24, 2007 - 02:40 pm:

“What happened here!” Judo said, or yelled, actually. ”This isn’t real.”

“AAAAAAAGGGGGHHHH!!!!”


“What was that!” Judo yelped.

He went out side to only find horror. The ship was in flames! People were being devoured by these beasts.

“Those are the monsters that killed the captain.” Judo thought to himself.


“GGragh!!” Goliath screamed as pulling off one of the beasts throwing it off the deck. “How many are there!”

“We need to find Judo and Chris!” Bonefist insisted angrily.

“Well we need to get off this ship!” Goliath snapped back in rage.

“ Well fine then!” Bonefist told them. ”I’ll find them!”

He then dashed off out of sight.

“Stupid kid---”Goliath started to say but then another huge leech grabbed a hold of his left hand. “AAAGGGHHHH! STUPID BEASTS!!!!!!!!”


“Judo!” Bonefist repeated over and over. “Chris!”

He once again repeated ”JudoAAAGGGGHHH!!!”

One of the devil leeches had attached himself onto Bonefist’s back.
No matter how hard he tried he could not get the beast off him.

He tried to scream for help, but then two more pounced on his arm.

“Judo! Chris!” He once again tried to say but his word were drowned out by his screams of pain .

As more and more fiends latched onto him, his pleas became weaker and weaker.

“Judo? ’Hah-hah’ Chris? ”he tired to ask one last time. ”Please. . .”
He then fell over the rail falling into the his watery grave.
